definition.text: Superalgos is a Community project! We make the software available to everyone free-of-charge, but we do ask for something in return... your help!

paragraphs.text: How can Superalgos be free? What's the catch? We get those questions often! This is the short story...
Superalgos started with a group of friends joining forces to automate their crypto trading!

The friends soon realized that to compete with top market players a huge software infrastructure was required. The system needed to be on par or better than commercial and proprietary software available to firms. Such requirements could not be fulfilled by a small team â€”at least not in a reasonable timeframe.
